name: A frigid scale of frostworm chitin
data: It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It has nice armour class for its type (little in general).
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance adequately.
It decreases the users fire resistance somewhat.
The shield has the power to freeze most liquids on contact, assimilating them
into the icy barrier that surrounds the scale.
